ygData.subject: Re: Thex Mallet
ygData.msgSnippet: To get the note you need to say some phrase which i dont know, but i believe its a SK guildmaster in Neriak that tells you what it is.  The phrase
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
To get the note you need to say some phrase which i dont
know, but i believe its a SK guildmaster in Neriak that
tells you what it is.
<snip>
The phrase is: "utalk adarev otcin"
Haven't tried it myself, but I don't know if Gix will
talk to me or give me note since I am a troll SK of
Thule. :)

Off topic...
Why is it that most magic weapons need you to be 20th +
in level to get? In must cases the creatures you are
fighting doing more damage than you. Is ok in groups,
but I solo mostly.
Example.
With 1HS @ 61 skill or so, I max damage at 9 (includes
STR bonus from Siphon Strength). With my 2HS @68ish and
a FS2HS I max damage at 25ish. Using each weapon on the
same creature that cons blue this is what happens to me.
With 2HS I have more than half life and mana left. With
1HS I have 1 bubble or so left and no mana. This was
done vs Skeles in Befallen. They hit for 18-22 max a pop
vs a 9 with a whip and my delay is still more than their
natural delay even with a whip.
Granted having 1HS maxed for the Dark Reaver is the way
to go, but at 35th level to get that blade, I won't be
using 1 HS! Back to topic....

Stats on Thex Mallet:
Magic Item Lore Item
Skill: 1HB Atk Delay:33
DMG: 5
SV Magic: +5
WT: 8.5 Range: 40
Class: WAR CLR PAL RNG SHD DRU MNK BRD ROG SHM
Race: All

All info can be found at:
http://everquest.gamestats.com/
Click "Quests", then click the Befallen link. :)

L8er.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
13th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
